features:
Short cuff: 
Salomon short cuffs are worn inside the jacket sleeves, to keep snow out with minimal bulk.

Clip-in loop: 
Finger-mounted clip-in loop enables you to attach your gloves to a carabiner with finger-tips facing up, eliminating snow-fill.

Elastic leash: 
Elastic leash from the cuff of your glove / mitten to your wrist that prevents loss.

Nose wipe: 
Made of very soft material placed on the thumb, the nose wipe allows for easy removal of snow or water from the face without irritating the skin.

Leather: 
Salomon gloves are made of high quality leather that is strong enough to ensure durability and soft enough to provide great comfort.

Softshell: 
A breathable and very stretch fabric that offers basic weather protection.

Velcro wrist closure: 
Velcro is the simplest way to adjust gloves, even if snow gets in between the layers.
